name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Circle to Search - Circle it, Find it

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your searching experience with AI, from wonder to widsom, just one drag away!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌐 Circle to Search: Enhance Your Chrome Browsing Experience

🔥 Circle to Search: Your Ultimate Chrome Extension for Effortless Words, Animal, delicious food Etc.

🚀 Simply circle or highlight. That's all it takes to launch an AI-powered search without leaving your page. Circle to Search is not just an extension; it's your smart companion in the vast world of the internet, enhancing every aspect of your browsing experience from study to work, and everything in between.

💡 Key Features
🔍 Instant Search with a Circle: Circle or highlight text or images to search in a snap.
🖌️ Versatile Highlighting Tools: Scribble, tap, or full circle - our interface understands your gesture.
🔌 Seamless Integration: Works perfectly within Chrome, enhancing your browsing without interruption.
🚀 Enhanced Productivity: Save time and effort in your online research or study.

🚀 How to Use:
🔸 Install: Click the 'Add to Chrome' button and pin it to your toolbar.
🔸 Activate: Use floated icon to activate the search circle.
🔸 Sign In: Log in to your Google account for a personalized experience.
🔸 Discover: Begin your enhanced search experience with the power of AI!

❓ Answers to Common Questions:
Supported Search Engines: Google, and others, with more to be added.
ChatGPT/OpenAI Account: Not required. Set up a free account for additional features.
Global Use: Available in every country, overcoming ChatGPT restrictions.
Pricing: Free for a limited number of uses. A Premium Plan is available for unlimited access.

📪 Contact Us:
For inquiries or suggestions, reach out at 💌 pioneeroluke@gmail.com. Experience the next level of browsing with Circle to Search and make the internet work for you!
